mapper.select: SELECT knowledge_point_id as knowledgePointId, knowledge_point_group_id as knowledgePointGroupId, name FROM knowledge_point WHERE knowledge_point_group_id = #{knowledgePointGroupId} AND is_deleted=0 ORDER BY name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO knowledge_point(knowledge_point_id, name, knowledge_point_group_id, is_deleted) VALUES(#{knowledgePointId}, #{name}, #{knowledgePointGroupId}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE knowledge_point SET name=#{name}, knowledge_point_group_id=#{knowledgePointGroupId} WHERE knowledge_point_id=#{knowledgePointId}
UPDATE knowledge_point SET is_deleted=1 WHERE knowledge_point_id=#{knowledgePointId}
